tit.j: ハイアットリージェンシー京都

sen.j: ハイアットリージェンシー京都 (Hyatt Regency Kyoto) は、京都市東山区三十三間堂にあるホテル。
sen.e: Hyatt Regency Kyoto is a hotel located in Sanjusangendo, Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.
Hyatt Regency Kyoto is a hotel located in Sanjusangendo, Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.
Hyatt Regency Kyoto is a hotel located in Sanjusangendo, Higashiyama-ku Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: ハイアットホテルアンドリゾーツの1つである。
sen.e: It belongs to Hyatt Hotels and Resorts.
It belongs to Hyatt Hotels and Resorts.
It belongs to Hyatt Hotels and Resorts.

sen.j: 運営は東山ホールディング(社長・安永孝之）。
sen.e: It is operated by Higashiyama Holding (with Takayuki YASUNAGA as the president)
It is operated by Higashiyama Holding (with Takayuki YASUNAGA as the president)
It is operated by Higashiyama Holding (with Takayuki YASUNAGA as the president).
sen.cmt: ピリオドを補足しました。

sen.j: 特徴
sen.e: Features
Features
Features

sen.j: 2005年1月まで営業していた地上5階建ての京都パークホテル。
sen.e: Until January of 2005, it was operated as Kyoto Park Hotel with five stories above ground.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Until January of 2005, it was operated as Kyoto Park Hotel with five stories above ground.
Until January 2005, it was operated as Kyoto Park Hotel with five storeys above ground.

sen.j: 改装を行い、ハイアットホテルアンドリゾーツの1つとした。
sen.e: After that, the hotel was renovated and its name was changed to Hyatt Regency Kyoto, indicating a hotel belonging to Hyatt Hotels and Resorts.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: After that, the hotel was renovated and its name was changed to Hyatt Regency Kyoto, indicating a hotel belonging to Hyatt Hotels and Resorts.
After that, the hotel was renovated and its name was changed to Hyatt Regency Kyoto, indicating a hotel belonging to Hyatt Hotels and Resorts.

sen.j: 2006年3月15日、リニューアルオープンした。
sen.e: Then Hyatt Regency Kyoto opened on March 15, 2006.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Then Hyatt Regency Kyoto opened on March 15, 2006.
Then Hyatt Regency Kyoto opened on March 15, 2006.
sen.cmt: 訳文に合わせて、9行目の原文「2006年3月15日」をこのセルに入れました。

sen.j: 標準のゲストルームで30平方メートルの広さ。
sen.e: A standard guest room is provided with a space of 30 square meters.
A standard guest room is provided with a space of 30 square meters.
A standard guest room is provided with a space of 30 square meters.

sen.j: スイートルーム4室を含む全188室。
sen.e: The total number of guest rooms is 188, including four suites.
The total number of guest rooms is 188, including four suites.
The total number of guest rooms is 188, including four suites.

sen.j: 3つのレストラン、ラウンジバー、スパ、フィットネスセンターがある。
sen.e: Three restaurants, a lounge bar, a spa, and a fitness center are provided.
Three restaurants, a lounge bar, a spa, and a fitness center are provided.
Three restaurants, a lounge bar, a spa, and a fitness center are provided.

sen.e: Five minutes by car from Kyoto Station

tit.j: 京阪電気鉄道七条駅より徒歩5分
tit.e: Five minutes on foot from Shichijo Station of Keihan Electric Railway
Five minutes on foot from Shichijo Station of Keihan Electric Railway

sen.j: 関西国際空港からJR特急はるかで80分。
